question.text: What is the main function of the cytoskeleton?
question.explanation: The cytoskeleton organizes cellular contents and provides structural support.

question.text: Which cytoskeletal element is most dynamic?
question.explanation: Microtubules undergo rapid assembly and disassembly through dynamic instability.

question.text: What connects the cytoskeleton to ECM?
question.explanation: Focal adhesions link the actin cytoskeleton to the extracellular matrix through integrin proteins.
Different cytoskeletal elements work together to maintain cell shape and structure.

question.text: What role do crosslinking proteins play?
question.explanation: Crosslinking proteins connect cytoskeletal filaments to form networks and bundles.
